attributes.action: Support Cardinal O"Brien in defence of the Unborn Children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Cardinal bravely pointed out that the equivalent of 2 Dunblane attacks happens daily in this country.
These poor Children daily try to escape the surgeons attacks in a Mother"s womb, unwanted and brutally killed.
Society does not want to listen to the silent cries of these babies.
